description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Business_UnitObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Business_UnitObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Business_UnitObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Business Unit.

Business_Unit_Data.description: Business Unit Reference ID. This is the Business Unit unique identifier.
Boolean flag which when set to true will include the Business Unit ID in the Business Unit Name.
Boolean Flag which when set to true inactivates the Business Unit.
